body:
So recently my Minecraft account has been used by another person, And I'm not sure what I can do about it.

The person has changed the account email, meaning I can't log in to change password anymore.

I was able to log in earlier, but was kicked off when the other person logged on.

I don't know how he/she got in, as I added security questions.

If anyone knows how I can get the person out of my account, please halp.

title: [Help] Account Compromised

replies.body:
https://help.mojang.com/customer/en/portal/articles/361483-my-account-was-stolen

>If you are not getting password reset emails within a few minutes, or you are sure that your account was compromised, locate your transaction ID or gift code and contact customer support.
replies.body_tagged:
https://help.mojang.com/customer/en/portal/articles/361483-my-account-was-stolen

>If you are not getting password reset emails within a few minutes, or you are sure that your account was compromised, locate your transaction ID or gift code and contact customer support.

replies.body:
From when has this been happening?
I saw you playing just a few hours ago.

I totally recommend doing what Atdit suggested.
They should get back to you in 24-48 hours
Due to your account being compromised I have banned your account so said person cannot log in.

replies.body: whats wrong about asking for help
replies.body_tagged: whats wrong about asking for help

reply_to.body: whats wrong about asking for help
reply_to.body_tagged: whats wrong about asking for help

replies.body: While I don't have any help for this right now, I do recommend changing passwords and such for everything else you had and/or currently have connected to MineCraft account so as to prevent those from getting compromised as well.
replies.body_tagged: While I don't have any help for this right now, I do recommend changing passwords and such for everything else you had and/or currently have connected to MineCraft account so as to prevent those from getting compromised as well.
